project.description: B-Jenkins-DataPower-2: - uses DCM to get a ZIP file backup of a chosen domain - file produced: /var/jenkins_home/workspace/B-Jenkins-DataPower-2/app-dev-backup.zip - $ unzip -l app-dev-backup.zip: Archive: app-dev-backup.zip Length Date Time Name --------- ---------- ----- ---- 1851 2019-06-18 16:56 export.xml 0 2019-06-18 16:56 dp-aux/ 241684 2019-06-18 16:56 dp-aux/clixform.xsl 4251174 2019-06-18 16:56 dp-aux/drMgmt.xml 13693 2019-06-18 16:56 dp-aux/basetypes.xml 8273 2019-06-18 16:56 dp-aux/management.xsl 23319 2019-06-18 16:56 dp-aux/SchemaUtil.xsl 6456 2019-06-18 16:56 dp-aux/map-dmz.xsl 12274 2019-06-18 16:56 app-dev.zip --------- ------- 4558724 9 files Unzip app-dev-backup.zip to produce app-dev.zip which can be imported.

hudson.tasks.Ant.properties: dcm.dir=/var/dcm-product uid=admin pwd=admin host=b_datapower_1 domain=app-dev # ABOVE IS 1st, THIS IS LIST OF FURTHER - domains=app-dev backup.file=/var/jenkins_home/workspace/B-Jenkins-DataPower-2/app-dev-backup.zip
